embed.description: Hi guys, So I was having the same issue and I managed to fix it. Here how I've done that : **Step 1** : - Go to "**C:\Riot Games\League of...

replies.body:
The steps found in that Reddit thread are primarily the steps found in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434).  Essentially, the main solution there is forcing your patcher to re-patch itself in hopes of resolving the issue.  This step is [explained in detail](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434#wq4) in this article as well.

If you are having issues opening the patcher, this should help!
